actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to establish an Office for Economic Policy Coordination within the Department of the Treasury and an Office of Energy Policy Coordination within the Federal Energy Administration.

summary.text: Establishes an Office for Economic Policy Coordination within the Department of the Treasury and an Office of Energy Policy Coordination within the Federal Energy Administration. States that it shall be the function of each of these Offices to solicit State and local involvement in and to advise States and localities with respect to Federal policy decisions in economic or energy matters.

titles.title: A bill to establish an Office for Economic Policy Coordination within the Department of the Treasury and an Office of Energy Policy Coordination within the Federal Energy Administration.
